com.android.uiautomator.common.helpers

Class AppHelperBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.uiautomator.common.helpers.AppHelperBase

  • public abstract class AppHelperBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Base app helper class intended for all app helper to extend. This class provides common APIs that are expected to be present across all app helpers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AppHelperBase

        public AppHelperBase()

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public abstract void open()
        Launches the application. This is typically performed by executing a shell command to launch the application via Intent. It is possible to launch the application by automating the Launcher views and finding the target app icon to launch, however, this is prone to failure if the Launcher UI implementation differ from one platform to another.

      • isOpen

        public abstract boolean isOpen()
        Checks if the application is in foreground. This is typically performed by verifying the current package name of the foreground application. See UiDevice.getCurrentPackageName()
        Returns:
        true if open, else false.

      • runShellCommand

        protected void runShellCommand(java.lang.String command)
        Helper to execute a shell command.
        Parameters:
        command -
